DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.ap_payment_header a left join xbs.option_line o on a.payment_type=o.option_line_id left join xbs.supplier s on a.supplier_id=s.supplier_id left join xbs.supplier_site s0 on a.supplier_site_id=s0.supplier_site_id left join xbs.mdm_bank_account_vx ba JOIN (SELECT org_id FROM org WHERE org_id='%{orgid}' OR parent_org_id='%{orgid}') ref ON ba.reftbltp='org' AND ba.refid=ref.org_id m on a.from_bank_account_id=m.mdm_bank_account_id left join xbs.mdm_bank_account_vx m0 on a.to_bank_account_id=m0.mdm_bank_account_id left join xbs.currency c on a.currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.currency c0 on a.doc_currency=c0.currency_id left join xbs.gl_currency_conversion g on a.exchange_rate_type=g.gl_currency_conversion_id left join xbs.gl_ledger g0 on a.ledger_id=g0.gl_ledger_id left join xbs.gl_period g1 on a.period_id=g1.gl_period_id left join xbs.option_line o0 on a.approval_status=o0.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o1 on a.payment_status=o1.option_line_id
DbDetails.Data: a.payment_number,o.option_line_value payment_type,a.reference_key_value,s.supplier_name supplier_id,s0.supplier_site_name supplier_site_id,a.description,m.account_number from_bank_account_id,a.header_amount,m0.account_number to_bank_account_id,c.title currency,c0.title doc_currency,g.currency_conversion_type exchange_rate_type,a.exchange_rate,a.document_date,a.document_number,g0.ledger ledger_id,g1.period_name period_id,o0.option_line_value approval_status,o1.option_line_value payment_status,a.reference_key_name,a.created_by,a.creation_date,a.last_update_by,a.last_update_date,a.ap_payment_header_id,a.bu_org_id
